creator.description: User reference of the creator of the element.

editor.description: User reference of the editor of the element.

hostname.description: The hostname of the branch which will be used to generate links across multiple projects.

ssl.description: SSL flag of the branch which will be used to generate links across multiple projects.

pathPrefix.description: Optional path prefix for webroot path and rendered links.

migrated.description: Flag which indicates whether any active node migration for this branch is still running or whether all nodes have been migrated to this branch.

latest.description: Flag which indicates whether this is the latest branch. Requests that do not specify a specific branch will be performed in the scope of the latest branch.

tags.description: List of tags that were used to tag the branch.

create.description: Flag which indicates whether the create permission is granted.

read.description: Flag which indicates whether the read permission is granted.

update.description: Flag which indicates whether the update permission is granted.

delete.description: Flag which indicates whether the delete permission is granted.

publish.description: Flag which indicates whether the publish permission is granted.

readPublished.description: Flag which indicates whether the read published permission is granted.

rolePerms.description: Permission information for provided role. This property will only be populated if a role query parameter has been specified.
